selection_reasoning: Selecting top 2 performers (analytical geometry and SLSQP) plus 2 with different approaches (multi-start and simulated annealing). The analytical geometry approach from opus is closest to target and should be refined. Many trials failed on constraints, so next generation should emphasize robust constraint handling.

trial_selections.reasoning: Best score at 2.6098, only 0.026 from target. Analytical geometry with constraint satisfaction approach from opus model. Clear winner to refine.
Second best at 2.5731. Uses scipy SLSQP which properly handles constraints. Different optimization approach worth exploring further.
Third best at 2.5212. Multi-start local search has room for improvement - could benefit from better initialization or more restarts.
Simulated annealing at 2.4. Different paradigm from gradient-based methods. Could improve significantly with better cooling schedule and longer runs.
